title: Add the Number of Options
text: We can add the number of red ace options to the number of club options to find the total number of options.
speech: We can add the number of red ace options to the number of club options to find the total number of options.
pacedSpeech: We can add the number of red ace options to the number of club options to find the total number of options.

title: Number of Red Aces
text: There are $$2$$ red aces in a deck of cards: an ace of diamonds and an ace of hearts.
speech: There are  2  red aces in a deck of cards: an ace of diamonds and an ace of hearts.
pacedSpeech: red aces in a deck of cards: an ace of diamonds and an ace of hearts.

title: Number of Clubs
text: There are $$13$$ clubs in a deck of cards, from the ace of clubs to the king of clubs.
speech: There are  13  clubs in a deck of cards, from the ace of clubs to the king of clubs.
pacedSpeech: clubs in a deck of cards, from the ace of clubs to the king of clubs.

title: Add the Number of Options
text: # of red ace options+# of club options\n$$2+13=15$$
speech: # of red ace options+# of club options\n, 2 plus 13, is equal to 15
pacedSpeech: # of red ace options+# of club options , 2 plus 13, is equal to 15

title: Total Ways
text: There are $$15$$ ways to pick a red ace or a club from a standard card playing deck.
speech: There are  15  ways to pick a red ace or a club from a standard card playing deck.
pacedSpeech: ways to pick a red ace or a club from a standard card playing deck.
